meanings.sent1: The machinists at the factory keep the machines running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The machinists were trained to handle various types of equipment.
meanings.sent3: The machinists had a race to see who could fix the machine the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The machinists were like wizards, casting spells on the metal to shape it perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The machinists' workshop buzzed with the sound of machinery all day long.

meanings.definition: A skilled worker who uses machine tools to shape metal or other materials
meanings.sent1: The machinists crafted intricate metal parts for the new engine.
meanings.sent2: Skilled machinists are in high demand in the manufacturing industry.
meanings.sent3: The machinists' precision was so sharp; they could carve their initials on a bolt.
meanings.sent4: The machinists sculpted the metal like artists, turning raw materials into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The machinists' expertise transformed simple metal pieces into complex components.
